column1: ## RECS''## RECS'' indicates a Recommendations pre-process header. Please do not remove these lines.
## RECSUse this file to upload product display information to Recommendations. Each product has its own row. Each line must contain 19 values and if not all are filled a space should be left.
## RECSThe last 100 columns (entity.custom1 - entity.custom100) are custom. The name 'customN' can be replaced with a custom name such as 'onSale' or 'brand'.

## RECSIf the products already exist in Recommendations then changes uploaded here will override the data in Recommendations. Any new attributes entered here will be added to the product''s entry in Recommendations.

column5: Investors seize fresh opportunity in US municipal debt market
column6: Discover why the US municipal bond market is thriving in 2024, driven by robust issuance, strong inflows, and key fundamentals. Learn more with LSEG insights.

column5: Valuation re-rating of emerging markets | LSEG
column6: 2025's first Macro Microscope explores a key topic reflecting the changing global landscape: the valuation re-rating of emerging markets (EMs). Watch the episode to learn more.

column4: Tajinder Dhillon, Dewi John, Luke Lu, Robin Marshall and Irene Shi
column5: 2025 year-ahead US outlook: Macro, equities, funds, RMBS, CMBS, and CLO insights
column6: Initial market reactions to the outcome of the 2024 U.S. Presidential and Congressional elections broadly followed the 2016 playbook, with equities outperforming Treasuries, curves steepening, and the term premium increasing. Learn more in this insight.

column5: How green economy exposure can help to diversify your portfolio
column6: This insight delves into key sustainable investing considerations within the wealth management space, highlighting the evolving role of ESG data and the benefits of investing in the green economy.

column5: Transforming connection and collaboration across financial services
column6: Now, in partnership with LinkedIn, LSEG is integrating LinkedIn functionality into the Open Directory pilot app within Teams. Learn more in this insight.

column5: Using news to predict post-earnings drift in US markets | LSEG
column6: This insight explores the predictive power of news data on post-earnings price movements in the US stock market.

column5: Fragmented markets, unified solutions: Tackling liquidity with LSEG | LSEG
column6: Discover how LSEG's tools and analytics tackle fragmented liquidity, empowering traders and fund managers with real-time insights and smarter execution strategies.
